title: Product object
description: A Product resource identifies anything from an ad placement to a Run of Network product in the publisher’s product catalogue.

$schema.description: $schema only included to aid validation of JSON, should not be used in real calls.

ActiveDate.title: Active Date
ActiveDate.description: The date and time, in UTC, that the product may become part of the bookable inventory. Use ISO-8602 format for the time and date.

AdFormatTypes.title: Ad Format Types
AdFormatTypes.description: A list of ad types that the product supports.

AllowNoCreative.title: Allow No Creative
AllowNoCreative.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether line items assigned to this order may be booked before creative is assigned. A value of TRUE allows lines to be booked without creative assigned. Default value is TRUE for OOH

Geometry.title: Geometry
Geometry.description: A list of ad format sizes that the product supports.

BasePrice.title: Base price
BasePrice.description: The product’s base retail price; this is not the rate card price. The actual price may be more if targeting is specified.

Currency.title: Currency
Currency.description: Identifies the currency for BasePrice and MinSpend.

DeliveryType.title: Delivery Type
DeliveryType.description: The type of delivery. For example, exclusive, guaranteed or non-guaranteed.

Icon.title: Icon
Icon.description: URL to a thumbnail icon of the product. May be used to display next to the product in the product catalog.

Languages.title: Languages
Languages.description: A list of creative languages that the product supports. Values provided using LANGUAGE reference data as specified in section 4.10.

LeadTime.title: Lead time
LeadTime.description: The time from the time of booking that a line that reference this product can begin running; the line’s start date must be equal to or later than today + n.

Name.title: Product Name
Name.description: The product's display name. The name must be unique.

ReservedExpiryTime.title: Reserved expiry time
ReservedExpiryTime.description: Defines the day of the week and time of day that represents the cut off point for expiry of a Line for the Product when it is “reserved”.

RetirementDate.title: Retirement Date
RetirementDate.description: The date and time, in UTC, that the product may be removed from the bookable inventory.

AdvertiserIdAccess.title: Advertister ID Access
AdvertiserIdAccess.description: List of AdvertiserIDs with access to this Product. NULL = all accounts can access this product.

BuyerIdAccess.title: Buyer ID Access
BuyerIdAccess.description: List of BuyerIDs with access to this Product. NULL = all accounts can access this product.

ThirdPartyIdAccess.title: Third Party ID Access
ThirdPartyIdAccess.description: List of ThirdPartyIDs with access to this Product. NULL = all accounts can access this product.

TargetTypes.description: An Array of OOHbjects that identify the types of targeting that the product supports.

AvailsGroupBy.description: An array of OOHbjects that describe the grouped fields that that the Availability data can be returned in

TimeZone.title: Timezone
TimeZone.description: The time zone that the product runs in.

Url.title: The Url Schema
Url.description: A URL to the specification that describes the creative requirements.
